Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 6,500 SF - 100,000 SF Office available for Lease in Allentown, PA

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
645 Waterfront Drive combines classic architectural styles with modern amenities to create a luxury working experience along the banks of the Lehigh River. The property’s lavish two-story lobby is equipped with visitor waiting areas, a security concierge desk, and direct access to the building’s riverside patios and first floor retail and restaurant destinations.
TOTAL OFFICE RSF: 121,305
TOTAL RETAIL RSF: 17,000
TYPICAL FLOOR: 24,621 RSF
MINIMAL DIVISIBLE SPACE: 10,000 RSF
PARKING RATIO: 4 per 1,000 RSF

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Five Star Office and Retail Space

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: he Waterfront introduces a unique riverside district in the heart of Pennsylvania’s third largest city. The master plan includes 12 mixed-use buildings within a 26-acre smart urban campus environment. Tenants and visitors can experience a broad variety of exciting programming along the banks of the scenic Lehigh River. It’s all here.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
615 Waterfront Drive introduces modern transitional architecture to a dynamic lifestyle campus. The property’s Class A office offers tenants both panoramic water vistas and sweeping views of the developing city skyline. The River Façade is outfitted with floor to ceiling windows and balconies overlooking the Lehigh River while the City Frontage offers outside decks, meeting spaces, and views of a bustling Waterfront Drive.
TOTAL OFFICE RSF: 142,548
TOTAL RETAIL RSF: 19,000
FLOORS: 8
TYPICAL FLOOR: 20,364 RSF
PARKING RATIO: 4 per 1,000 RSF

Class-A office buildings in the heart of Downtown Allentown and close to premier apartments and amenities. The Butz Corporate Center offers businesses of any size the opportunity to lease in the downtown area and tax incentive district, the Neighborhood Improvement Zone (NIZ) in Downtown Allentown.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Minutes from I-78, Route 22 and the PA Turnpike

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Class-A office buildings in the heart of Downtown Allentown and close to premier apartments and amenities. The Butz Corporate Center offers businesses of any size the opportunity to lease in the downtown area and tax incentive district, the Neighborhood Improvement Zone (NIZ) in Downtown Allentown.
+  ±122,000 SF total building size+   6 floors
+  ±957 - 12,000 SF available+  Move-in ready suites
+  Phase II located in the NIZ
+  Minutes from I-78, Route 22 and the PA Turnpike

Located in the heart of the Western Lehigh Valley, Commerce Corporate Center is located just off the Northeast Extension of the Pennsylvania Turnpike (I- 476); Route 309, I-78, Route 100, as well as Route 22, are all within minutes from this campus. Commerce Corporate Center is a multi-building complex with three office buildings located on a campus like setting, minutes from shopping, dining, and lodging.
